description: head and torso of figure with pink hands and face, wearing a pink garment with white panel in front; two red round ornaments/buttons and two vertical black ornaments on front of garment; black and green cuffs; figure has shoulder-length black hair and round bright green eyes; figure wears a pink hat (or halo?) with four lobes; fingers--including thumbs--nearly the same length, with hands held in front of stomach; primitive style; pink frame

title: Untitled
